about.summary: Marray: Fast Runtime-Flexible Multi-dimensional Arrays and Views in C++

name: marray
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "marray" %}
{% set version = "3.1" %}
{% set sha256 = "306dffb19f64a67f6e1a8fb85c2c0d6a17c86b90c78ac26dfadadc731d4734ec" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://github.com/bjoern-andres/marray/archive/v{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

  patches:
    - cmake_fixes.diff
    - msvc_fixes.diff

build:
  number: 1
  skip: True        # [win and py<35]
  features:
    - vc14          # [win]

requirements:
  build:
    - python                        # [win]
    - vc 14                         # [win]
    - toolchain
    - cmake
    - hdf5 1.8.17|1.8.17.*
  run:
    - hdf5 1.8.17|1.8.17.*
    - vc 14                         # [win]

test:
  commands:
    - test -f $PREFIX/include/andres/marray.hxx                 # [unix]
    - if not exist %LIBRARY_INC%\\andres\\marray.hxx exit 1     # [win]

about:
  home: http://www.andres.sc/marray.html
  license: BSD 3-clause
  license_family: BSD
  summary: 'Marray: Fast Runtime-Flexible Multi-dimensional Arrays and Views in C++'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bluescarni
